recipes.name: Grilled Chicken
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate the chicken in salt, pepper, and olive oil.
2. Grill the chicken until cooked through.
3. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
recipes.description: Classic pasta dish with tomato sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
2. Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil.
3. Add tomato sauce and herbs, and simmer for 10 minutes.
4. Toss the cooked pasta in the sauce and serve.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cream together butter, sugar, and vanilla extract.
3. Mix in flour and chocolate chips.
4. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
5. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown.
6. Allow cookies to cool before serving.

recipes.name: Strawberry Shortcake
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar.
2. Whip cream until stiff peaks form.
3. Split the shortcake biscuits in half.
4. Layer strawberries and whipped cream between the biscuits.
5. Serve chilled.
